title: Tonsley Hotel Near Adelaide CBD with Bistro Restaurant
description:
Enjoy a comfortable stay between the coast and city in Tonsley, Adelaide. This stylish retreat is perfectly positioned for exploring the city's vibrant arts scene, with the celebrated Adelaide Festival Centre and Art Gallery of South Australia within easy reach. 

Savour South Australian flavours at the onsite restaurant or venture out to the bustling Adelaide Central Market, a foodie's paradise. Head into nearby Brighton for beachside eats or take a leisurely stroll along the picturesque River Torrens Linear Park Trail.
offer_address: 2 MAB Circuit, Tonsley 5042, Adelaide, South Australia, Australia
